code: import React,{useState}from"react";import"./Tampapp.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Wthr=()=>{let api={key:"02bea7dbe89e9910a08ef9552d0159e3",base:"https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather"};let[search,setsearch]=useState();let[weather,setweather]=useState();function locsearch(){fetch("".concat(api.base,"?q=").concat(search,"&appid=").concat(api.key,"&units=metric")).then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>{setweather(data);});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"main",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Weather By Akash"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"main-input",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",onChange:e=>setsearch(e.target.value),placeholder:"search location"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:locsearch,children:"search"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"App",children:weather?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"des",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:["Weather in ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:search})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Temperature: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"temp",children:weather.main.temp}),"\xB0C"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Weather: ",weather.weather[0].main]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Description: ",weather.weather[0].description]})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading..."})})]})});};export default Wthr;
